mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(username, password, last_logout_time, last_password_reset_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{lastLogoutTime}, #{lastPasswordResetTime})
mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.password, u.password, u.last_logout_time, u.last_password_reset_time, role.role_id, role.role_name, permission.perm_id, permission.perm_name from (select * from tbl_user where username = #{username}) as u, (select tbl_role.id as role_id, tbl_role.name as role_name from tbl_role where tbl_role.id in (select ur.role_id from user_role ur where ur.user_id = (select id from tbl_user where username = #{username}))) as role, (select p.id as perm_id, p.name as perm_name from tbl_permission p where id in (select permission_id from role_permission where role_id in (select role_id from user_role ur where ur.user_id = (select id from tbl_user where username = #{username})))) as permission
